Federal Guidance Updates

  • Category of Bipartisan Infrastructure Law (BIL) Agency Department of Energy
    Department of Energy Releases Final Interpretive Guidance on the Definition of Foreign Entity of Concern published May 03, 2024

    On May 3, the U.S. Department of Energy (DOE) finalized its guidance interpreting the statutory definition of “foreign entity of concern” (FEOC) in Section 40207 of the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law (BIL)

  • Category of Inflation Reduction Act (IRA) Agency Department of Energy
    Biden-Harris Administration Announces Final Transmission Permitting Rule and Latest Investments To Accelerate the Build Out of a Resilient, Reliable, Modernized Electric Grid published Apr 25, 2024

    On April 25, the DOE issued a final rule to establish the Coordinated Interagency Transmission Authorizations and Permits (CITAP) Program, which aims to significantly improve Federal environmental reviews and permitting processes for qualifying transmission projects.

  • Category of Inflation Reduction Act (IRA) Agency Internal Revenue Service
    IRS releases final guidance on transfers of certain credits under the Inflation Reduction Act published Apr 25, 2024

    On April 25, the Department of Treasury and Internal Revenue Service issued final regulations describing rules and definitions for the transfer of eligible credits in a taxable year, including specific rules for partnerships and S corporations.
